title: Lemon Herb Mediterranean Chicken Salad
directions: Whisk together all of the marinade/dressing ingredients in a large jug. Pour out half of the marinade into a large, shallow dish. Refrigerate the remaining marinade to use as the dressing later.

Add the chicken to the marinade in the bowl; marinade chicken for 15-30 minutes (or up to two hours in the refrigerator if time allows). While waiting for the chicken, prepare all of the salad ingredients and mix in a large salad bowl.
Once chicken is ready, heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a grill pan or a grill plate over medium-high heat. Grill chicken on both sides until browned and completely cooked through.
Allow chicken to rest for 5 minutes; slice and arrange over salad. Drizzle salad with the remaining dressing. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: juice of 1 lemon (1/4 cup fresh squeezed lemon juice)
(1 pound | 500 g) 4 skinless, boneless chicken thigh fillets (or chicken breasts)
4 cups Romaine (or Cos) lettuce leaves, washed and dried
â…“ cup pitted Kalamata olives (or black olives), sliced (optional)
